sub_title: Senior Consultant and Owner at Health Solutions & International Consultant at WHO
summary:
I am determined to make this world a healthier place by finding solutions for better lives. I find my inspiration in public health needs and challenges and try to create oppprtunities to improve health goods and services. My passion lays in policy making, strategic communication and education. But with 14+ years of experience in health project and program management, research, health promotion, learning development and training delivery I'm always open to brainstorm together about our common ambitions. 

Let's connect!

2019/2020: Policy and actions review for the 'action framework for developing and implementing public food procurement and service policies for a healthy diet'. Review of labeling policies, health and nutrition claims regulations and fat and sugar reduction measures. 
2017-2018: National heath and nutrition policies analysis and validation (multiple countries). Evaluating county responses, extracting and cataloging data related to the Global NCDs and Nutrition targets; Acknowledged contribution to 2nd Global Nutrition Policy Review. 
2015/2016: Analyzed 103 governmental documents from 11 countries  for the publication of the Global Nutrition Report 2016 (Acknowledged contribution). General review on multiple nutrition topics.
2014:  Delivery of 10 publications for the Knowledge, Ethics and Research department. Publications about developments in the health sector of Azerbaijan, Belarus, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Republic of Moldova, Russian Federation, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Ukraine and Uzbekistan.
